title: Factor Hunter Tee
description: Premium cotton blend featuring the 'Ink on Parchment' Factor Hunter design. Forged for comfort in any environment.
longDescription: The official uniform of the Factor Hunter. This high-quality tee features the iconic 'Ink on Parchment' design, screen-printed on a premium cotton blend. Durable, breathable, and ready for long debugging sessions.

title: Studio Hoodie
description: Heavyweight fleece hoodie with embroidered studio logo. Keeps the cold out while you keep the code flowing.
longDescription: When the compiler runs cold, this hoodie keeps you warm. Featuring a heavyweight fleece construction and the embroidered Andy's Dev Studio logo on the chest. Kangaroo pocket for storing snacks or spare cables.

title: Compiler's Cup
description: Matte black ceramic mug. Holds 16oz of your preferred caffeine solution. Dishwasher safe.
longDescription: Fuel your next sprint with the Compiler's Cup. This 16oz matte black ceramic mug is built to withstand high-temperature beverages and the occasional desk bump. Dishwasher and microwave safe.

title: Factor Hunter Tee (Spare)
description: Premium cotton blend featuring the 'Ink on Parchment' Factor Hunter design. Always good to have a backup.
longDescription: The official uniform of the Factor Hunter. This high-quality tee features the iconic 'Ink on Parchment' design, screen-printed on a premium cotton blend. Durable, breathable, and ready for long debugging sessions.

title: Studio Hoodie (Grey)
description: Alternated colorway. Heavyweight fleece hoodie with embroidered studio logo.
longDescription: When the compiler runs cold, this hoodie keeps you warm. Featuring a heavyweight fleece construction and the embroidered Andy's Dev Studio logo on the chest. Kangaroo pocket for storing snacks or spare cables.

title: Compiler's Cup (Travel)
description: Matte black ceramic mug. Now with a travel lid for coding on the go.
longDescription: Fuel your next sprint with the Compiler's Cup. This 16oz matte black ceramic mug is built to withstand high-temperature beverages and the occasional desk bump. Dishwasher and microwave safe.
